subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4838 is on the way
description_text:
Hello,

​I am contacting you to check the status of my order SF6047209808970.
​The tracking information has not been updated since the 6th of this month.
Could you please look into this and provide me with an update on its
current location and the estimated delivery date?
​Thank you for your assistance.

​Best regards,
Vítor Teixeira



Cumprimentos,
Vítor Teixeira

conversations.body_text: Hi Vitor Teixeira,    I will look into this for you as soon as possible. The package is expected to arrive on the 14th.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047209808970

Dear Customer Service Team,

​I am writing to express my concern regarding the status of my order
SF6047209808970, which was shipped on 30/12/2025.

​According to the tracking information, there has been no update since
January 6th. This is highly unusual, as deliveries typically take no more
than 48 hours to arrive from Spain. Given the lack of progress for several
days, I am concerned that the package may be lost.

​Could you please look into this matter and provide an update on the
current location of my parcel? If the shipment is indeed lost, I would like
to know what the next steps are for a replacement or a full refund.

​I look forward to hearing from you soon.

​Best regards,
Vítor Teixeira

Cumprimentos,
Vítor Teixeira

A segunda, 12/01/2026, 07:57, service@simsonn.com

Hi Vitor Teixeira,    We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. We have noted that the logistics process has indeed been delayed for several days, but fortunately, there has been an update. We will send an email to urge the logistics provider to expedite delivery.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047209808970
